alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 21 at 1:34PM MST until February 22 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Southwest winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast New Mexico and southwest and western Texas. * WHEN...From 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ this evening to midnight CST /11 PM MST/ Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...High winds could make driving difficult for motorists driving high profile vehicles such as campers, vans, and tractor trailers. A few power outages are also possible. Visibilities may be reduced to below a half mile due to blowing dust, especially downwind of cotton fields and construction sites.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County
